schedule: An early morning to Lukla from Kathmandu and trek to Phakding.
Trek to Namche Bazaar (3440m/11286ft). walking 5:30 hours. O/N at guest house. (B L D Plan)
Acclimatization day at Namche Bazzar. walking 5 hours  O/N at guest house. (B L D Plan).
Trek to Tengboche (3860m/12664ft). walking 5 hours. O/N at guest house. (B L D Plan).
Acclimatization day at Dinbuche. walking 4:25 hours
Trek to Everest Base Camp (5363m/17595ft) and back to Gorekshep (5153m/16906ft). walking 7:30 hours, O/N at guest house. (B L D Plan).
Hiking up Kalapathar (5545m/18192ft) and overnight at Zongla (4710m/15453ft). Walking 6 hours. O/N at guest house. (B L D Plan).
Trek to Thagna (4500m/14764ft) via the Chola-la cross(5420m/17782ft). Walking 7:30 hours
Hiking upto Gokyo Ri (5483m/1983ft) and trek down Marhhermo
Trek to Namche Bazaar (3440m/11286ft). Walking 5 hours
Trek down to Lukla (2804m/8490ft) walking 6:30 hours
An early morning flight back to Kathmandu from Lukla and transfer to the hotel at 3 stars level
